text.jpText:
朝の集会。樫本代理は着任早々、
今の学園の『緩さ』について語る。
text.enText:
Morning assembly. Acting Director Kashimoto 
spoke about the current "looseness" of the 
school as soon as she arrived.

text.jpText:
そして、トレーニングから食事の内容まで、
徹底管理する『管理教育プログラム』を
掲げる。
text.enText:
The company also has a "management education 
program" that thoroughly controls everything 
from training to diet.

text.jpText:
さらにチーム戦『アオハル杯』は、
思春期の集団暴走を招きかねないとし、
廃止の予定を宣言した。
text.enText:
She also declared that the "Aoharu Cup," a 
team competition, could lead to adolescent 
outbursts and that she plans to abolish it. 
The team competition, "Aoharu Cup," was 
declared to be discontinued.

text.jpText:
溢れ返るブーイング。タイキシャトルも
厳しすぎる方針に反対したが、
樫本代理に言い負かされてしまうのだった。
text.enText:
The booing overflowed. Even Taikishattle 
objected to the overly strict policy. but was 
overruled by Deputy Kashimoto.
